title: Red sands, blue seas
creator_credit: Oren Siedler, Sally Regan, CAAMA, Australian Film Commission and Discovery Video
brief_description: A fascinating 1/2 hour documentary about a group of aboriginal women potters from the deserts of central Australia making their first ever trip away from their homeland. They travel to a tropical Indonesian island to visit a group of women potters there. The experience of seeing the ocean and tropical bush for the first time and the clash of cultures.
